raw_dockerfile:
FROM node:alpine
WORKDIR /src
ADD ./backend /src/backend
ADD ./client /src/client
ADD ./app.js /src/app.js
RUN cd /src/backend && npm install --silent
CMD ["node", "/src/app.js"]
EXPOSE 3230

raw_dockerfile:
# Latest LTS node
FROM node:dubnium

# Create app directory
RUN mkdir -p /usr/src/app
WORKDIR /usr/src/app

# Install app dependencies
COPY package.json /usr/src/app/
RUN npm install --quiet

# Bundle app source
COPY . /usr/src/app

# Generate CSS
RUN npm start

EXPOSE 8080
# Run Sass watcher for Chrome
CMD [ "npm", "start" ]

raw_dockerfile:
FROM node:8.6-alpine

WORKDIR /usr/src/app

COPY package.json ./

RUN npm install --global --quiet npm && \
    npm install --quiet

RUN adduser -u 9000 -D app
COPY . ./
RUN chown -R app:app ./

USER app

RUN ./bin/nsp gather

VOLUME /code
WORKDIR /code

CMD ["/usr/src/app/bin/nsp", "check", "--offline", "--advisories", "/usr/src/app/advisories.json", "--warn-only", "--reporter", "codeclimate"]

raw_dockerfile:
# Base image
FROM iojs

# Set the working dir
WORKDIR /app

# Copy app files
COPY package.json /app/
COPY dist /app/dist/

# Install deps
RUN npm install --quiet --production

# Start command
CMD ["npm", "start"]

# Expose port
EXPOSE 9090

raw_dockerfile:
FROM node:4.2.4-wheezy
MAINTAINER Mark Stemm (mstemm@jut.io)

RUN mkdir -p /opt/juttle-engine
WORKDIR /opt/juttle-engine
ADD package.json package.json
RUN npm install --quiet
COPY . .

RUN mkdir -p /opt/juttle-engine/juttles
COPY examples /opt/juttle-engine/juttles/examples

RUN npm link

EXPOSE 8080

CMD /opt/juttle-engine/bin/juttle-engine --root /opt/juttle-engine/juttles

raw_dockerfile:
FROM node:8.1

WORKDIR /usr/app
EXPOSE 6001

COPY package.json .
RUN npm install --quiet
COPY . .
